sources.title: Phera ( 1988)
sources.description: Phera  ( English language : The Return ) is a  1988   Bengali   drama film  directed by  Buddhadeb Dasgupta  based on a story of Bengali novelist  Narendranath Mitra .  It was entered into the  38th Berlin International Film Festival , competition section.

metadata.Plot: An actor and a playwright becomes disgusted with contemporary drama trends of the time and resumes staying at his ancestral house with his helper and his mad love interest. He spends his time thinking about his disloyal wife who left him and talking with Rasu, the helper who mechanically gives company to his master. His sister in law comes to stay with him along with her son Kanu after the husband died and soon shares her bed with the playwright.
metadata.Writer: Buddhadev Dasgupta, Narendranath Mitra, Pritam Mukhopadhyay
metadata.Actors: Samit Bhanja, Biplab Chatterjee, Aloknanda Dutt
